price: 77. Katakalah (Muhammad, kepada orang-orang musyrik), “Tuhanku tidak akan mengindahkan kamu, kalau tidak karena ibadahmu. (Tetapi bagaimana kamu beribadah kepada-Nya), padahal sungguh, kamu telah mendustakan-Nya? Karena itu kelak (azab) pasti (menimpamu).”
arabic: قُلۡ مَا يَعۡبَؤُاْ بِكُمۡ رَبِّي لَوۡلَا دُعَآؤُكُمۡۖ فَقَدۡ كَذَّبۡتُمۡ فَسَوۡفَ يَكُونُ لِزَامَۢا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul mā yaʿba-u bikum rabbī lawlā duʿāukum faqad kadhabtum fasawfa yakūnu lizāman
